Sharing Nicely » south africa http://sharing-nicely.net Philipp Schmidt's shared learnings Wed, 25 Sep 2013 17:37:50 +0000 en-US hourly 1 http://wordpress.org/?v=3.8 What the #$%@ is this @#$%? http://sharing-nicely.net/2008/01/what-the-is-this/ http://sharing-nicely.net/2008/01/what-the-is-this/#comments Mon, 14 Jan 2008 12:17:54 +0000 http://bokaap.net/ideas/what-the-is-this/ That’s the name of my imaginary podcast series in which I would share all the things I think about when sitting in my car … usually to do with birth pains of the emerging young democracy in the Republic of South Africa. Let’s assume there actually is a process that will lead to strong and healthy democratic institutions and practices, then at this point, I would argue we can hardly see the head (and it might go back inside any moment).
